conbody.p: Eucalyptus 3.1 resolves issues listed in the following table.

row.entry: Issue
Description
Exclude .snapshot directories during upgrade process
clc: add back support for '--addressing private'
Walrus: Overwritting object causes object to become inaccessible
Issue when reconfiguring cc vnet ip range and mask
eee: euca-describe-property occasionally exits with an OOM
cc: centos kernel oops if too many vlan interfaces left enabled
deleteOnTerminate=true doesn't delete a volume
MySQL connections are refused in some cases
initial db sync retry logic can hang
review all uses of db queries with LIKE condition
CC <-> NC comm fails when number of volume records on an instance exceeds 64
IAM: Account admin can not see the policies of users and groups within account
euare: uploading new policy with the same name does not overwrite old policy
Upgrade needs to migrate images after all users have been migrated
StartInstance fails for SYSTEM/STATIC mode
if instances are terminated quickly after being launched and then new instances are launched right away, new instances do not get public IPs
Upgrade: After upgrade on RHEL5, euca-describe-instances shows public key instead of keypair name
CC: metadata redirect is not re-applied in non HA mode if CC is DISABLED/ENABLED and pubinterface == privinterface
NC: under load, NC fails to respond to Describe* requests promptly
eustore-install-image should not download an image into a predictable filename in /tmp
eustore-install-image should not untar and bundle images using predictable dir and filenames in /tmp
cluster-pk.pem should not be on NC host
SSL/TLS services should support cipher configuration and disable weak ciphers by default
Secret key generation can have insufficient random data
CLC Reports incorrect root-device-type
Non-SOAP requests can be replayed by changing the Signature "format"
Let eucalyptus build when given the jars that it needs, not a file called cloud-lib.tar.gz
HA CC upgrade: Disabled CC continues to have NAT rules for an instance
Replace --db-home option with a way to supply paths to binaries
Configure database binary locations somewhere other than CLOUD_OPTS
CC: empty security group iptables chains and rules for disabled security groups may remain in iptables after instances are terminated
db: connection timeout does not trigger when remote host is down
When changing ADDR_PER_NET, old security groups are no longer usable
EBS: snapshot is not protected by permission checking in CreateVolume
IAM: user name needs to allow back slash and underscore for AD sync
Dashboard: Images page - "EuStore documentation" links to page not found
RE: 3.0.1 Released - upgrade failed - netapp .snapshot directory
metadata IP address is not added to the private interface when rebooting a single-host frontend
HA not working as expected when MySQL process is killed on ENABLED machine
Manifest File Larger Than 100K Causes Failed Instance Launch
BFEBS Instances Not Reported Correctly => DescribeInstance
Stale Rules Left in iptables
Instance Fails to Launch Even When There is Enough Disk Space
DB init fails when euca.db.home doesn't end with '/'
CC: on precise, iptables no longer supports negation with '-d ! <net>' but instead only supports '! -d <net>'
CC: on precise, icmp type must now be specified to iptables for icmp rules to apply
JMX management is enabled on port 1099
NC crash on startup when configured for MANAGED-NOVLAN
Boto 2.4 causes CLC to return XML with euca: namespaces if no api_version is specified
Reporting: Storage report shows null where account name should be
Reporting: Exception thrown when generating report grouped by account
QA failures, file2str needs to handle 0 as a valid fd
Add/remove *.LICENSE files for current JARs
NC: race condition exists between instance cache copy and operations that update global instance list
Cannot "euca_conf --initialize" on Ubuntu Lucid
euca-clone-volume fails to bind host / component fields
latest eucalyptus-cloud produced error when starting. Causes faststart to fail out.
Upgrade to 3.1.0 fails when accounts or users have been deleted from a cloud
Failing to create snapshots using netapp
Loop device warning message when starting NC on Lucid
Outbound request contextual information is not always cleaned up
euca-get-credentials result in index out of range error
NC: artifact provisioning deadlocks (technically, blocks on a super-long timeout)
Standalone walrus /vmware failing during QA runs
apparmor needs to be disabled and remove on NCs in order for instances to launch
Upgrade: Failure to upgrade image tables
NPE during report generation.
IllegalArgumentException running S3
nc: precise: getstats.pl isn't gathering block data when virtio is enabled
Registering VMware broker on a second cluster in a cloud will kill all clusters' SCs if broker libs not installed.
euca-describe-* admin tools can generate invalid format strings
Upgrade: Unable to attach volume created before upgrade
Upgrade does not handle vmware broker component
sc: reporting: cannot generate 'storage' reports
Upgrade: Unable to upgrade due to ConstraintViolationException
Can not use pre-existing sec groups post 3.0.2 to 3.1 upgrade
EUARE: a salt should be used when hashing and storing user passwords
Full set of S3 canned-acls should be supported by Walrus
